item.title: Theranos Trial Starts for Ramesh Balwani, Elizabeth Holmes’s Ex-Partner
item.description: Prosecutors say Ramesh Balwani worked hand in hand with Elizabeth Holmes, the Theranos chief executive, who was convicted of four counts of fraud
